title: Living Tomorrow : Intermediate Technology (TEFC)
creator_credit: Mike Murray, Ken Ashton and Bob Thorpe
brief_description: Our modern high tech. society endlessly devours the landscape, yet the English intermediate technology group, Living Tomorrow, is determined that the developing world should not waste its precious resources in the same way. Demonstrates some of the developments in intermediate technology for use in both the first and third worlds.
